buginformation.summary: Add support for Querydsl 4 QueryDSL starting from version 4.0.0 is not compatible due to package rename
buginformation.description: Packages of QueryDSL have been renamed from com.mysema.query.* to com.querydsl.* . QueryDslPredicateExecutor depends on the old package names, which makes latest QueryDSL unusable with Spring Data.

buginformation.summary: Add support for Querydsl 4 Port to querydsl 4.0.0
Enabling Spring Data web support breaks @ModelAttribute binding in Spring MVC DomainClassConverter triggered unnecessarily
